projects.title: Text-to-Image-Convertor
projects.description: A lightweight Text-to-Image Converter built with the MERN stack, Tailwind CSS, and Canvas API. Customize fonts, colors, and backgrounds to generate stylish text-based images for social media, branding, and more.

projects.title: fullstack-chatty
projects.description: A real-time chat application built with the MERN stack and Socket.IO. Features user authentication, live messaging, and a modern, responsive UI.
